definition: shaped like a rhombus or rhomboid, any of several muscles of the upper back that help move the shoulder blade
details:
adjective
- shaped like a rhombus or rhomboid
= example: shaped like a rhombus or rhomboid
= synonyms: rhomboidal
noun
- any of several muscles of the upper back that help move the shoulder blade
= synonyms: rhomboid muscle
- a parallelogram with adjacent sides of unequal lengths
